    • Constructor Detail

      • Blackjack

        public Blackjack()
        Initializes a game of blackjack. This creates a full ordered deck of cards, your hand, the dealer's hand, and the discard pile. It also initializes your count and the dealer's count to zero.

    • Method Detail

      • changeRoundState

        public void changeRoundState(Blackjack.State state)
        Sets the current round's play state.
        Parameters:
        state - the new play state

      • shuffleDeck

        public void shuffleDeck()
        Randomizes the order of the card deck

      • hitMe

        public void hitMe()
        Adds a card to your hand (and possibly the dealer's). Also appropriately updates your count (and possibly the dealer's)

      • hitDealer

        public void hitDealer()
        Adds a card to the dealer's hand. Also appropriately updates the dealer's count.

      • reduceWeights

        public boolean reduceWeights()
        Reduces ACE weights where necessary. This method checks each hand for a bust, and tries to reduce ACE weights appropriately. If the user's hand is good, then the dealer's hand is checked in the same manner.
        Returns:
        false if bust, true otherwise

      • checkBust

        public boolean checkBust()
        Checks if either hand has bust, and changes state if so.
        Returns:
        true if either hand has bust, false otherwise.

        public Blackjack.State checkWin()
